title: To get more G.O.P. poll workers installed, Republicans turn to lawsuits.
dc:creator: Alexandra Berzon

media:content.media:credit: Seth Herald/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:content.media:description: Voting in Flint, Mich., during the 2020 election. The Republican National Committee and the state party filed a lawsuit arguing that election officials in Flint did not hire a sufficient number of Republican poll workers.
